short_summary: A call for information for a Tel- Interpretation Service Contract for the Government of Canada.
description:
Service Canada delivers Government of Canada services and information on programs. 

Service Canada is committed to improve opportunities for all Canadians, including newcomers that are at a disadvantage because they do not speak, or may not have sufficient understanding of, either of Canada’s two official languages. 

In this project, Telephone Interpretation Services (TIS) contract will be available to support agents in all Service Canada Centres (SCCs), Service Canada Centres – Passport Service (SCC-PS), Scheduled Outreach Sites, and for some services offered as part of the 1-800-O-Canada contact centre and other specialized call centres.  The department is looking for potential suppliers for this service.
full_summary:
================================

## Service Description
Service Canada requires a provider to deliver Telephone Interpretation Services (TIS) to support the delivery of government services to clients in multiple languages. The service will be provided to various Service Canada locations, including centres, outreach sites, and call centres.

## Background
Service Canada is committed to providing equal access to its services, including those in Indigenous languages, to reduce barriers and increase access for the Indigenous population. Telephone interpretation services will help Service Canada staff identify and respond to the needs of allophone newcomers and Indigenous clients who require government services.

## Contract Overview
The Telephone Interpretation Services contract will be used to support the delivery of government services at various Service Canada locations, including:

* Service Canada Centres (SCCs)
* Service Canada Centres – Passport Service (SCC-PS)
* Scheduled Outreach Sites
* Temporary Foreign Worker Program (TFWP)

The department is seeking a supplier to provide this service, which will be used to respond to the needs of individuals who require interpretation services in multiple languages.

## Request for Information (RFI) Document
The Request for Information (RFI) document that contains additional information about the contract can be obtained from the following link:

* [English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4524/rfi--telephone-interpretation-services-100023536---en.pdf)
* [French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4524/ddr---les-services-dinterpretation-par-telephone-%28sit-100023536---fr_0.pdf)

## Contact Information
If you have any questions regarding this RFI, please contact Jie (Jessica) Bai at:

* Email: [NC-SOLICITATIONS-GD@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca](mailto:NC-SOLICITATIONS-GD@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 000000000
* Fax: None

## Tender Details
The request for tender for this contract has closed on April 17th, with one amendment applied.
